title: My galaxy j3 luna pro is now bei g called My pixel. Im extremely hacked, they only take 1 hr now.
content: Tech support and I reset phone and all new settings, within 1 hr. I'm hacked w all different settings. 4yrs& over 30.phones. cops laughed at me. I'm harrassed. APKmirror is on my apps. What or how do I get this resolved? Anything in settings does not work, they see everything I do and say.
